info.title: Development Challenge for PHP
info.description: This challenge aims to evaluate basic skills in PHP development, and a bit of data/entity modeling. The idea is to build an HTTP REST API.

post.operationId: Get a JWT via given credentials.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/auth/login"

schema.example: {"name":["The name field is required."],"email":["The email field is required."],"password":["The password field is required."]}

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/auth/register"

post.operationId: Log the user out (Invalidate the token).

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/auth/logout"
curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/auth/refresh"
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/auth/user-profile"

get.operationId: Display a listing of the resource.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/V1/movies"

post.operationId: Store a newly created resource in storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost/api/V1/movies"
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost/api/V1/movies/{movie}"

put.operationId: Update the specified resource in storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X PUT "http://localhost/api/V1/movies/{movie}"

delete.operationId: Remove the specified resource from storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X DELETE "http://localhost/api/V1/movies/{movie}"
